form.label: Splunk - IDX - 01 - Data Quality - Dashboard - v1
form.description: Source Type Data Quality issues & All Source Type definitions

search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=splunkd log_level IN (WARN,ERROR) component IN (AggregatorMiningProcessor, DateParserVerbose, LineBreakingProcessor) | rex field=message "Context: source::(?<context_source>[^\|]*?)\|host::(?<context_host>[^\|]*?)\|(?<context_sourcetype>[^\|]*?)\|" | eval data_source=if((isnull(data_source) AND isnotnull(context_source)),context_source,data_source), data_sourcetype=if((isnull(data_sourcetype) AND isnotnull(context_sourcetype)),context_sourcetype,data_sourcetype) | rex field=message "^(?<reason>.*?)-" | rex field=message "line\slength\s>=\s(?<line_length>\d+)" | rex field=message "match\s\((?<timestamp_match>.*?)\)" | eval reason = case ( match(reason, "^A possible timestamp"), "A possible timestamp match is outside of the acceptable time window. If this timestamp is correct, consider adjusting MAX_DAYS_AGO and MAX_DAYS_HENCE", match(reason, "^Accepted time"), "Accepted time format has changed", match(reason, "^Truncating line"), "Truncating line because limit of X bytes has been exceeded with a line length >= X", match(reason, "^Failed to parse timestamp"), "Failed to parse timestamp in first MAX_TIMESTAMP_LOOKAHEAD (X) characters of event. Defaulting to timestamp of previous event", match(reason, "^Time parsed"), "Time parsed is too far away from the previous event's time to be accepted. If this is a correct time, MAX_DIFF_SECS_AGO (X) or MAX_DIFF_SECS_HENCE (X) may be overly restrictive", match(reason, "^Breaking event because"), "Breaking event because limit of X has been exceeded ", match(reason, "^Changing breaking behavior"), "Changing breaking behavior for event stream because MAX_EVENTS (X) was exceeded without a single event break. Will set BREAK_ONLY_BEFORE_DATE to False, and unset any MUST_NOT_BREAK_BEFORE or MUST_NOT_BREAK_AFTER rules. Typically this will amount to treating this data as single-line only", match(reason, "^The TIME_FORMAT specified"), "The TIME_FORMAT specified is matching timestamps outside of the acceptable time window. If this timestamp is correct, consider adjusting MAX_DAYS_AGO and MAX_DAYS_HENCE", match(reason, "^Too many events"), "Too many events X with the same timestamp: incrementing timestamps X second(s) into the future to insure retrievability", match(reason, "^The same timestamp has been used for"), "The same timestamp has been used for xK consecutive times. If more than yK events have the same timestamp, not all events may be retrieveable", true(), reason) | `get_instance_info_simple(host)` | fields host Splunk_Roles component data_source data_sourcetype reason line_length timestamp_match | stats count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor" OR component=="DateParserVerbose" OR component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor")) as "Total Issues" dc(data_source) AS "Source Count" count(eval(component=="LineBreakingProcessor")) AS "Line Breaking Issues" count(eval(component=="DateParserVerbose")) AS "Timestamp Parsing Issues" count(eval(component=="AggregatorMiningProcessor")) AS "Aggregation Issues" dc(line_length) as "# of Line Length Issues" dc(data_host) as "# of Hosts Involved" dc(timestamp_match) as "# of Time Stamps" values(reason) as "Reason" values(Splunk_Roles) AS Splunk_Roles by host data_sourcetype | rename host AS Splunk_Instance data_sourcetype AS Sourcetype | search Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance$" Sourcetype="$Sourcetype$"

panel.title: Data Quality Broken Down by Reason

search.query: | table Sourcetype "# of Hosts Involved" "# of Line Length Issues" "# of Time Stamps" "Aggregation Issues" "Line Breaking Issues" "Source Count" "Timestamp Parsing Issues" "Total Issues"

| inputlookup splunk_rest_configs_conf_props_sh_csv_lookup where title = "$Sourcetype$" | rename title as Sourcetype | makemv delim="|" Splunk_Roles | search Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance$" | fields Splunk_Instance Splunk_Roles Sourcetype appName description SHOULD_LINEMERGE LINE_BREAKER TRUNCATE EVENT_BREAKER EVENT_BREAKER_ENABLE TIME_PREFIX TIME_FORMAT MAX_TIMESTAMP_LOOKAHEAD DATETIME_CONFIG BREAK_ONLY_BEFORE BREAK_ONLY_BEFORE_DATE MUST_BREAK_AFTER KV_MODE INDEXED_EXTRACTIONS ANNOTATE_PUNCT LEARN_SOURCETYPE LEARN_MODEL MAX_EVENTS maxDist | stats values(*) AS * By Sourcetype | table Sourcetype appName description SHOULD_LINEMERGE LINE_BREAKER TRUNCATE EVENT_BREAKER EVENT_BREAKER_ENABLE TIME_PREFIX TIME_FORMAT MAX_TIMESTAMP_LOOKAHEAD DATETIME_CONFIG BREAK_ONLY_BEFORE BREAK_ONLY_BEFORE_DATE MUST_BREAK_AFTER KV_MODE INDEXED_EXTRACTIONS ANNOTATE_PUNCT LEARN_SOURCETYPE LEARN_MODEL MAX_EVENTS maxDist | rename appName AS App description AS Description
